name: Home@F37

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed in this hotel twice with-in 2 weeks, we found it to be clean with large rooms, the front desk staff could be more friendly and helpfull as they were not so as we found elsewhere in our stays with-in India. The breakfast's were minimal considering the room charge but the ordered in food at dinner were very good as well as good value.
reviews.title: Nice and clean

reviews.text: I visit Delhi two or three time a year for work; on my last visit I stayed at Home@37 for the first time and found it a real haven to return to each day. My room was spotlessly clean, well designed with nice contemporary touches and the shower was the best I have encountered in Delhi or elsewhere in India! A bottle of water was supplied each day, the room was cleaned and bed made each day as well (this was a big difference from previous places stayed in!), I could make a cup of tea or coffee and keep extra juices etc in the fridge. It also had a hair dryer!
reviews.title: GOOD HOTEL, GREAT LOCATION

reviews.text: The room service was good ... you can order from a simple menu. I also found the breakfast great ... again the range is simple, but just perfect for a start to teh day in India. Freshly made omelette of your choice, extremely good coffee and an alternating choice of paratha or puri, again freshly cooked for you, plus idli, sambar, baked beans, finger chips, cereals, fruit, toast an so on.
reviews.title: Good value for money.

reviews.text: I had lunch at the hotel just before leaving for a trip out of Delhi ... again, it was very simple but was one of the best meals I have had in Delhi ... dhal, methi potato, mixed vegetables and chapati ... delicious!
reviews.title: Sometimes small is truly beautiful :)

description: Perfectly positioned in the heart of South Delhi, Home@F37 dares to be that little bit different. Stylishly furnished with a relaxed and friendly atmosphere, whether you are staying on business or pleasure, our philosophy is to ensure you feel entirely at home at our townhouse hotel.
